Maths

add16To32 View Source

Performs ACIX = ACIX + DE

cpBCDE View Source

Compares DE to BC.

Output

Same as z80 CP instruction.

cpHLBC View Source

Compares HL to BC.

Output

Same as z80 CP instruction.

cpHLDE View Source

Compares HL to DE.

Output

Same as z80 CP instruction.

crc16_init View Source

Initializes a Cyclic Redundancy Check.

Outputs

DE

Fresh CRC value

crc16_updateBuffer View Source

Updates the current CRC16 with the CRC16 of a buffer of given size.

Inputs

DE

Current CRC16

HL

Pointer to buffer

BC

Number of bytes to process

Outputs

DE

Updated CRC16

crc16_updateByte View Source

Updates the current CRC16 with the CRC16 of a single byte.

Inputs

A

byte to process

DE

Current CRC16

Outputs

DE

Updated CRC16

div32By16 View Source

Performs ACIX = ACIX / DE

Outputs

B

0

HL

Remainder

ACIX

ACIX / DE

div8By8 View Source

Performs D = D / E

Outputs

A

Remainder

D

D / E

divACByDE View Source

Performs AC = AC / DE

Outputs

AC

AC / DE

HL

Remainder

divHLByC View Source

Performs HL = HL / C

Outputs

A

Remainder

HL

HL / C

icos View Source

Returns the cosine of the given angle.

Inputs

A

Angle

Outputs

A

Sine of the angle, scaled to 64

Notes

The input angle has a period of 256, and the output value will be in the range [-64, 64] to represent [-1, 1].

That is, to get the cosine of 180 degrees, pass in 128 and you will receive -64 (two's compliment).

isin View Source

Returns the sine of the given angle.

Inputs

A

Angle

Outputs

A

Sine of the angle, scaled to 64

Notes

The input angle has a period of 256, and the output value will be in the range [-64, 64] to represent [-1, 1].

That is, to get the cosine of 180 degrees, pass in 128 and you will receive 0.

mul16By16 View Source

Performs an unsigned multiplication of DE and BC.

Inputs

DE

Multiplier

BC

Multiplicand

Outputs

DEHL

Product of DE and BC.

mul16By8 View Source

Performs an unsigned multiplication of A and DE.

Inputs

A

Multiplier

DE

Multiplicand

Outputs

AHL

Product of A and DE.

mul32By8 View Source

Performs an unsigned multiplication of DEHL and A.

Outputs

DEHL

product of DEHL and A

mul8By8 View Source

Performs an unsigned multiplication of H and E

Inputs

H

Multiplier

E

Multiplicand

Outputs

HL

Product of H and E.

sdivACbyDE View Source

Performs AC = AC / DE. The operation is signed.

Output

AC: AC / DE HL: Remainder

Notes

B is destroyed

smax View Source

Returns the largest between HL and DE. The operation is signed.

Inputs

DE

integer

HL

integer

Outputs

DE

the smallest of the previous HL and DE

HL

the largest of the previous HL and DE

smin View Source

Returns the smallest between HL and DE. The operation is signed.

Inputs

DE

integer

HL

integer

Outputs

DE

the largest of the previous HL and DE

HL

the smallest of the previous HL and DE

smul16By8 View Source

Performs a signed multiplication of A and DE.

Inputs

A

Multiplier

DE

Multiplicand

Outputs

HL

Product of A and DE.

sub16From32 View Source

Performs ACIX = ACIX - DE
